folder: Hamilton Avenue & Van Brunt Street, Brooklyn, NY
original_title: Brooklyn: Hamilton Avenue - Van Brunt Street
text:
Hamilton Avenue, north from Van Brunt Street. The three buildings on the right are Nos. 1 to 5 Carroll Street, the one on the extreme right (No. 5) being at the corner of Carroll Street. On the left is the India Wharf Warehouse, at Conover Street.

October 21, 1939

P. L. Sperr

View is north from Summit Street. Most of the buildings on the East side (right) of the avenue were later razed to make way for the construction of Gowanus Parkway.

P. L. Sperr

October 21, 1939

folder: Van Brunt St. & Hamilton Ave., Brooklyn, NY
original_title: Brooklyn: Van Brunt St. - Hamilton Ave.
text:
Van Brunt Street, east side, north from Hamilton Avenue. The house on the right is No. 63 on the latter thoroughfare.

P. L. Sperr

October 21, 1939
Views 1, 2

View 1: Van Brunt Street, north from Carroll Street.
